Related Character(s): 泉
Связанный символ (и): 泉

灥字的基本解释

灥
xún
三泉。

灥
quán
古同“泉”。

灥
quàn
下雨而泉水出。

灥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xún］
［《廣韻》詳遵切，平諄，邪。］
三泉；众流。
[②]［quán］
［《集韻》從緣切，平，從。］
同“泉1”。
水源。
[③]［quàn］
［《集韻》取絹切，去綫，清。］
雨天而泉水出。

灥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灥； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页664第20
【唐韻】詳遵切【集韻】松倫切，?音旬。【說文】三泉也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?昌緣切，音穿。義同。一曰衆流也。　又【集韻】從緣切，音全。與泉同。

灥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
灥字的起名意思

指三泉。

group of springs
Basic explanation of words
group of springs
xún
Sanquan.
group of springs
quán
The ancient same "spring".
group of springs
quàn
It rains and spring water comes out.
group of springs
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xún］
["Guangyun" follows the cut in detail, flat and honest, evil. ]
Three springs; crowd flow.
[②]［quán］
["Ji Yun" cut from the margin, level , from. ]
Same as "Spring 1".
Water source.
[③]［quàn］
["Ji Yun" take silk cut, remove thread, clear. ]
Spring water comes out on rainy days.
group of springs
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　灥; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 664 No. 20
【Tang Yun】Detailed following cut 【Ji Yun】Songlun cut,? Yin Xun. [Said the text] Sanquan also.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Chang Yuan cut, sound wear. The same meaning. One said the crowds flow.　[Jiyun] Cut from the edge, full sound. Same as spring.
group of springs
